mainText:
Promo: "Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Reality!"

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: I once demanded a private jet just to pick up my morning coffee, and when it wasn't ready upon landing, I declared it a national emergency. The barista's apologetic trembling as she handed me my latte confirmed what I had known all along - my entitlement knows no bounds.
